game.name: Connected Clue
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Full controller support, Color Alternatives, Custom Volume Controls, Playable without Timed Input, Save Anytime, Steam Cloud, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: 커넥티드 클루는 19세기 탐정 소설 감성을 담은 쿼터뷰 추리 어드벤처 게임입니다. 단서를 모아 거짓을 간파하고, 베일에 싸인 범인의 정체를 밝혀내세요!
game.shortDescriptionEn: Connected Clue is a quarter-view detective adventure game inspired by the atmosphere of 19th-century mystery novels. Gather clues, see through lies, and uncover the identity of the culprit shrouded in secrecy!
